home.description: Voile Drift helps you capture life events in Google Calendar and provides intelligent insights powered by Gemini AI.

hero.title: Capture Life's Moments, Get
hero.description: Voile Drift seamlessly stores your events in Google Calendar and uses Gemini AI to help you understand patterns in your life.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: Voile Drift combines powerful features with simplicity to help you track and understand your life better.

googleCalendarSync.title: Google Calendar Sync
googleCalendarSync.description: Seamlessly sync your events with Google Calendar. Access your schedule anywhere, anytime.

richDescriptions.title: Rich Descriptions
richDescriptions.description: Capture detailed event information with rich text descriptions to remember every moment.

geminiAiInsights.title: Gemini AI Insights
geminiAiInsights.description: Get intelligent analysis of your activities and patterns with the power of Gemini AI.

simpleInterface.title: Simple Interface
simpleInterface.description: Clean, intuitive design that makes logging events effortless and enjoyable.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Getting started with Voile Drift is simple. Three easy steps to a more organized life.

step1.title: Log Your Events
step1.description: Quickly capture any life event with details, notes, and timestamps using our intuitive interface.

step2.title: Sync to Calendar
step2.description: Your events are automatically saved to Google Calendar, keeping everything organized in one place.

step3.title: Get AI Insights
step3.description: Gemini AI analyzes your patterns and provides personalized insights about your activities.

cta.title: Start Tracking Your Life Today
cta.description: Gain valuable insights into your daily life with Voile Drift. Available now on Android.

about.heroDescription: Voile Drift was created with a simple mission: to help you understand your life better through intelligent event tracking and AI-powered insights.
about.missionTitle: Making Life Tracking Simple and Meaningful
about.missionDescription1: We believe that understanding your daily activities and patterns is the first step to living a more intentional life. Voile Drift bridges the gap between simple event logging and meaningful insights.
about.missionDescription2: By combining the reliability of Google Calendar with the intelligence of Gemini AI, we've created a tool that not only stores your events but helps you understand them.
about.calendarPlusAiDescription: The perfect combination for understanding your life patterns.
about.valuesDescription: The principles that guide everything we build.

userCentric.title: User-Centric Design
userCentric.description: Every feature is designed with you in mind, making life tracking effortless and enjoyable.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data belongs to you. We prioritize your privacy and security in everything we do.

intelligent.title: Intelligent Insights
intelligent.description: Leveraging the power of Gemini AI to provide meaningful patterns and insights.

about.technologyDescription: We use industry-leading technologies to deliver the best experience.

googleCalendar.name: Google Calendar
googleCalendar.description: Seamless integration for reliable event storage

geminiAi.name: Gemini AI
geminiAi.description: Advanced AI for intelligent pattern recognition

materialDesign.name: Material Design
materialDesign.description: Beautiful, intuitive interface following modern design principles

about.ctaDescription: Download Voile Drift today and start understanding your life better.

featuresPage.heroDescription: Voile Drift combines intelligent AI insights with seamless calendar integration to help you understand and improve your daily life.
featuresPage.dashboardDescription1: The Voile Drift dashboard gives you a comprehensive overview of your tracked events and AI-generated insights. See patterns emerge as you log more activities.
featuresPage.dashboardDescription2: Weekly summaries, trend analysis, and personalized suggestions help you make the most of your time.

googleCalendarSync.title: Google Calendar Sync
googleCalendarSync.description: Seamlessly sync your events with Google Calendar. Your data is always backed up and accessible across all your devices. Never lose track of important moments.

geminiAiInsights.title: Gemini AI Insights
geminiAiInsights.description: Powered by Google's Gemini AI, get intelligent insights about your habits and patterns. Discover trends you never knew existed and make data-driven decisions about your life.

simpleTimeTracking.title: Simple Time Tracking
simpleTimeTracking.description: A clean, intuitive interface makes logging events effortless. Track your activities with just a few taps - no complicated setup or learning curve required.

easyGettingStarted.title: Easy Getting Started
easyGettingStarted.description: Get up and running in seconds. Sign in with your Google account and start tracking immediately. Your calendar is automatically connected - no manual configuration needed.

featuresPage.ctaDescription: Download Voile Drift today and start tracking your life with powerful AI insights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you. Click the button below to send us a message.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: Nelson Kenzo Tamashiro ("we," "our," or "us") operates the Voile Drift mobile application ("the App"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our App.
introduction.content2: Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. By using the App, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

providedItems.account: Account Information: When you sign in with Google, we receive your name, email address, and profile picture.
providedItems.events: Event Data: Events you create, including titles, descriptions, dates, times, and any notes you add.

automaticItems.usage: Usage Data: How you interact with the App, including features used and time spent.
automaticItems.device: Device Information: Device type, operating system version, and unique device identifiers.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:

items.maintain: Provide and maintain the App's functionality
items.sync: Sync your events with Google Calendar
items.insights: Generate AI-powered insights using Gemini AI based on your event data
items.support: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
items.updates: Send you updates and notifications related to the App

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: The App integrates with the following third-party services:

googleItems.calendar: Google Calendar API: To store and retrieve your events

thirdParty.googlePolicy: Your use of Google services is governed by
thirdParty.geminiContent: We use Google's Gemini AI to analyze your event data and generate insights. Your event descriptions and patterns may be processed by Gemini AI to provide personalized insights. This processing is subject to Google's AI terms and privacy policies.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
dataSecurity.intro: Your event data is primarily stored in your Google Calendar account. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information, including:

items.encryption: Encryption of data in transit using HTTPS

dataSecurity.disclaimer: However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security of your data.

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.providers: With Service Providers: Third-party services that help us operate the App (Google Calendar, Gemini AI)
items.legal: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
items.business: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.access: Access: Request access to your personal data
items.correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate data
items.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your data
items.portability: Portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format
items.withdraw: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for data processing

yourRights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. Your event data is stored in your Google Calendar account and is subject to Google's retention policies. You can delete your data at any time through the App or your Google Calendar.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: The App is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete that information.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contactUs.title: 11. Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By downloading, installing, or using Voile Drift ("the App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the App.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.intro: Voile Drift is a mobile application that allows users to:

items.insights: Receive AI-powered insights through Gemini AI integration

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: To use certain features of the App, you may need to sign in with your Google account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

userContent.title: 4. User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of any content you create using the App, including event descriptions and notes. By using the App, you grant us a limited license to process your content solely for the purpose of providing the service.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: The App integrates with third-party services including:

items.calendar: Google Calendar: For event storage and synchronization
items.gemini: Google Gemini AI: For generating insights about your events

thirdParty.note: Your use of these services is also subject to their respective terms of service and privacy policies.

items.unlawful: Use the App for any unlawful purpose
items.unauthorized: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the App or its systems
items.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the App's functionality
items.reverse: Reverse engineer or attempt to extract the source code
items.harass: Use the App to harass, abuse, or harm others

intellectualProperty.title: 7. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The App, including its design, features, and content (excluding user content), is owned by Nelson Kenzo Tamashiro and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without prior written consent.

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The App is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the App will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

limitation.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Nelson Kenzo Tamashiro shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the App.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. We will notify users of significant changes through the App or via email.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to the App at any time, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these terms or is harmful to other users or us.

contactInfo.title: 12. Contact Information
contactInfo.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
